name: Mixer - (GMTK Game Jam 2021)
description:
How to Play:
  • Select ingredients from the moving columns.
  • When you have the ingredients you want in the ingredient window below, click the mix button to see if you have mixed the drink correctly.
  • You can remove unwanted ingredients by clicking on them in the ingredient window.
  • If you made the drink correctly it will be removed from the current drink order above and the next drink will need to be made.
  • When you finish making all the drinks in the order, a new table of drinks will be ordered for you to make.
  • When you fill the bar at the top you have completed all tables for the level and you will be presented with your score!
  • Levels have increasing difficulty and more advanced drinks will be unlocked for you to make!
  • Study the Bartenders Guidebook to find out how to make each drink!
  • Finish drinks quickly and you will earn a happy customer! If the timer reaches zero any drinks that have not been completed will be angry customers, also if you make the drink wrong you will earn an angry customer. Customer ratings contribute to your score at the end of the round.

Have Fun!

Post your high score below or leave me a comment about the game!
